name: Robo Morph 3D
description: Robo Morph 3D is a game where you morph cool pets to advanced species of robots. Just tap at any part of the body and rotate it to correct outlined position by swiping over it. You can morph cute pets into gigantic dinosaurs or bigger animals. Similarly you can also morph big robots into cool gadgets or cute rabbits by positioning it's parts to correct outlined places. Don't forget to unlock legendary characters from shop. So, what are you waiting for? Can you convert a little rat into giant robot?
